      • rotateVectorAroundAxis

        public static Vector rotateVectorAroundAxis​(Vector vector,
                                            Vector rotationAxis,
                                            double thetaDegrees)
        Rotates a given vector around a given axis by a given angle.

        Rotation is performed using Rodrigues' rotation formula.

        Parameters:
        vector - the vector
        rotationAxis - the axis of rotation
        thetaDegrees - the angle of rotation in degrees
        Returns:
        the rotated vector scaled to unit length
